powerful business search
service for account holders only try now

This service was created for the business people, which are focused on reception of the focused result by search of the various companies all over the world. The independent search of the necessary information in the Internet can take days and even months.
We take your routine on ourselves using the technology of search.

The service is based on human-computer interaction. This circumstance allows most correctly to choose the necessary result from a huge flow of the information with an immediate human estimation. Your inquiry will be processed by the Research Team: experts in marketing, on information technologies, lawyers. If necessary we contact to the representatives of the required company for specification of the data, found by a search team.

  • Result of search. You receive our report as a result of the Expanded search. The report contains the following information:
    The name of the company
    Ways of communication(connection) with the representatives
    The links to official web sites of the company
    The general information on the basic activity of the company.
    The links to the Internet resources containing the information on the company.

    • But this way takes time. The 1GARD Research Team spends up to some hours, processing each retrieval request. The requests will be processed in that sequence in which have arrived. Thus you can receive complete report in 2-3 days.
